mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.content, r.image reviewImage, m.email memberEmail, p.id productId, p.name productName, p.category productCategory, p.image productImage FROM review r JOIN member m ON r.member_id = m.id JOIN product p ON r.product_id = p.id;
mapper.insert: insert into review(content, image, member_id, product_id) VALUE (#{reviewContent}, #{reviewImage}, #{memberId}, #{productId});
